CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Project__r.Project_Location__r.Location__c,"Dombivali"),
IF( Total_Waiver_Amount_to_be_Approved__c + Total_Approved_Interest_Amount_Waived__c + Interest_Waiver_Approved_but_not_Waived__c <= 50000, "Level 1",
IF( Total_Waiver_Amount_to_be_Approved__c + Total_Approved_Interest_Amount_Waived__c + Interest_Waiver_Approved_but_not_Waived__c <= 150000, "Level 2", "Level 3" ) ),
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Project__r.Project_Location__r.Location__c,"Mumbai"), ISPICKVAL(Project__r.Project_Location__r.Location__c,"South Mumbai") ),
IF( Total_Waiver_Amount_to_be_Approved__c + Total_Approved_Interest_Amount_Waived__c + Interest_Waiver_Approved_but_not_Waived__c <= 100000, "Level 1",
IF( Total_Waiver_Amount_to_be_Approved__c + Total_Approved_Interest_Amount_Waived__c + Interest_Waiver_Approved_but_not_Waived__c <= 300000, "Level 2", "Level 3" ) ),
"Not Applicable" ))
CustomField.label: Waiver Approver Level
